document_data.name: Ulou
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Ulou languages''' was a grouping of related [[Faerûnian languages]] spoken in diverse regions of [[Faerûn]], the most famous of which were probably [[Damaran language|Damaran]] and [[Netherese language|Netherese]].<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}

The secret language of [[illusionist]]s, [[Ruathlek]], was also a member of this language group.<ref name=D:SiT-p28/>
document_data.Languages:
The Ulou group was further divided into the following subgroups:<ref name=D:SiT-p28/>
* [[Netherese language|Netherese]]
* [[High Ulutim languages|High Ulutim]]
* [[Low Ulutim languages|Low Ulutim]]
* [[Chard languages|Chard]]
* [[D'tarig language|D'tarig]]
document_data.Script: Ulou languages made use of a variety of scripts.
